dct_description_sm: Walls of Imperial City, Tartar City, and Chinese City are shown. Gates are located and labeled. Extent of built areas within city walls is shown. An-ting-mên (Gate of the Allied armies in 1860), temples, European churches, and embassies [foreign legation quarter] are shown. From: Journal of the Royal Geographical Society of London. Vol. 36 (1866), pp. 128-56; held in Firestone Library. Call number: G7 .J687 v. 36 1866.
dct_publisher_sm: London : published for the Journal of the Royal Geographical Society, by J. Murray, Albemarle Street, 1866.
